title: Smerz Announce New Tour Dates, Share New “Dreams” Video: Watch
description: Henriette Motzfeldt and Catharina Stoltenberg will support Big City Life with concerts in September, October, and November
author: Matthew Strauss
excerpt: Henriette Motzfeldt and Catharina Stoltenberg will support Big City Life with concerts in September, October, and November
text: Smerz have announced new tour dates in support of their new album, Big City Life. The experimental pop duo will play European shows in September and October, before heading to North America for more October dates. Smerz return to Europe and the United Kingdom in November. See Smerz’s tour dates below.Along with the tour news, Smerz have shared the music video for “Dreams.” The visual is directed by Lengua. Watch it below.Big City Life is the second studio album from Smerz—the experimental pop duo of Henriette Motzfeldt and Catharina Stoltenberg. Smerz preceded the album with the singles “A Thousand Lies,” “You Got Time and I Got Money,” “Roll the Dice,” and “Feisty.”All products featured on Pitchfork are independently selected by our editors. However, when you buy something through our retail links, we may earn an affiliate commission.Smerz: Big City Life TourSmerz:09-06 Oslo, Norway - Munch09-10 Stockholm, Sweden - Hus709-11 Malmö, Sweden - Inkonst09-12 Aarhus, Denmark - Alter Festival09-13 Copenhagen, Denmark - Alice09-14 Copenhagen, Denmark - Alice09-25 Helsinki, Finland - Kuudes Linja10-09 Krakow, Poland - Unsound10-12 Seattle, WA - Madame Lou’s10-13 Portland, OR - Holocene10-15 Reno, NV - Holland Project10-16 San Francisco, CA - Cafe du Nord10-17 Los Angeles, CA -Regent Theater10-20 Chicago, IL - Empty Bottle10-21 Toronto, Ontraio - The Garrison10-22 Montreal, Quebec - Théâtre Fairmount10-24 Queens, NY - TBA11-03 Madrid, Spain - Sala B11-04 Barcelona, Spain - El Pumarejo11-05 Lisbon, Portugal - B.Leza Clube11-08 Bristol, England - Simple Things11-18 London, England - Moth Club11-19 London, England - Moth Club11-21 Bern, Switzerland - TBA11-22 Berlin, Germany - Silent Green
html:
Smerz have announced new tour dates in support of their new album, Big City Life. The experimental pop duo will play European shows in September and October, before heading to North America for more October dates. Smerz return to Europe and the United Kingdom in November. See Smerz’s tour dates below.

Along with the tour news, Smerz have shared the music video for “Dreams.” The visual is directed by Lengua. Watch it below.

Big City Life is the second studio album from Smerz—the experimental pop duo of Henriette Motzfeldt and Catharina Stoltenberg. Smerz preceded the album with the singles “A Thousand Lies,” “You Got Time and I Got Money,” “Roll the Dice,” and “Feisty.”

All products featured on Pitchfork are independently selected by our editors. However, when you buy something through our retail links, we may earn an affiliate commission.

Smerz: Big City Life Tour
